mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_CODE "boardCode", BOARD_NAME "boardName" FROM BOARD_TYPE ORDER BY BOARD_CODE

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, READ_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) COMMENT_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) LIKE_COUNT,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 ) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 ) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END BOARD_WRITE_DATE
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(${boardNo}) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
